alert.note: Alert for Elbert, Central and East Douglas Counties Above 6000 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 2:13PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Douglas and northwestern Elbert Counties through 245 PM MDT... At 212 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over The Pinery, or 20 miles southeast of Denver, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Northeastern Castle Rock, southern Parker, Franktown, Ponderosa Park, The Pinery and northeastern Castle Pines. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Elbert, Central and East Douglas Counties Above 6000 Feet
